Lilly Singh-Ranveer Singh Rap Together, PC-Nick Absurd Divorce Rumors And More From Ent World
Lilly Singh-Ranveer Singh Rap Together, PC-Nick Absurd Divorce Rumors And More From Ent World
After winning the hearts of the audience with his rapping skills in Zoya Akhtar's blockbuster Gully Boy, Ranveer Singh was in his full elements last night, as he rapped his way to glory with YouTube star Lilly Singh aka Superwoman.
If reports are to be believed, Nick and PC have already called their legal team and are planning to sue the magazine for spreading the rumours.
Irrfan's film will be a Homi Adajania-directed venture and Bebo has finalized her dates and will join the cast and crew by May-end during the London schedule.

The film is helmed by screenwriter Gary Dauberman, who has earlier written Annabelle, Annabelle: Creation and The Nun among others, which definitely means that our money is worth betting!
Panga will release on January 24, 2020, and the film will star Richa Chaddha, Neena Gupta and Jassie Gill in pivotal roles.
title: Top Entertainment News:Lilly Singh-Ranveer Singh Rap Together, PC-Nick Absurd Divorce Rumours And More From Ent World
